originalText.text:
I had nothing but exceptional service from uptempo , they have an awesome customer care team that answers all your questions and concerns !! Yes you might have to pay a service fee -> it’s a service they are providing
This is to ensure you don’t miss a payment and that you transition into paying more easily and confidently, it’s worth every penny !!

originalText.text: Awful, simply awful. Says they have taken my money out of my account, then I have my lender l telling me they don’t have the payment. Happened multiple times, even after my wife and I called about it. Wish I could give 0 stars.

text.text: Awful, simply awful. Says they have taken my money out of my account, then I have my lender l telling me they don’t have the payment. Happened multiple times, even after my wife and I called about it. Wish I could give 0 stars.

originalText.text: Quite possibly the worst. . I’ve had nothing but trouble with them from the beginning. Between taking money out and my loan company calling me telling me my payment is past due, and then taking money out at random times during the month. Now this past month they’ve taken money out three times rather than two. I’ve had enough and I’ll be canceling as soon as I can on Monday. Also, considering some legal action, because I’m sure that some of this is very fraudulent. Definitely going to contact my loan company and see exactly how many payments they’ve received as opposed to how many have been taken out from up-tempo.

originalText.text:
Don't do it. Pay the loan yourselves!
We were misinformed by the dealership and had no idea that this third party company was involved in our bill pay. No fault of Uptempo.
To our surprise after we just paid the payment ourselves, another charge comes out, and it's for MORE than the amount of the car payment. When we called to find out what was going on we were informed #1 who they are and what they do #2 They didn't have our loan account information and were waiting to hear from someone with the account number so they could make payment for us. Excuse me what? You took our money and didn't even have all the info to pay the loan?! Were you going to call us?! No. Would you have kept on taking our money and not paying our loan because you didn't have the info you needed?! What in the world?! If we hadn't questioned it and we were aware of this third party company,  we would have assumed that our loan was getting paid.  Nobody contacted us. What kind of game you running? No thanks. Hard pass.

originalText.text: I decided to cancel this program & pay directly to my lender. I was actually under the impression that this was a program through my lender, but that was my fault for not asking the proper questions when I bought my car. The customer service reps were really nice. It was the financial manager (or whoever she was) who called me to confirm the cancellation that was rude. When I returned her call that I missed, I called the 800 number. She said something like “I gave you my direct number so I don’t know why you called the 800 number!” Ma’am.. just cancel my account so I never have to call you or uptempo again.. on any number.
